level.heading: Reduced-risk pesticides and methods of pest control.

level.text: If a pesticide designated by the Mayor as reduced-risk pursuant to subsection (b) of this subsection is applied, the operator shall indicate on the customer notice provided in ยง 8-403.01(a)(9) that the customer has selected a reduced-risk pesticide.
Within 6 months of June 5, 2008, the Mayor shall approve a list of reduced-risk pesticides and methods of pest control.
